text_en: Before learning Braille, the children have to train the tactile senses.
Then it´s time to learn that a letter consists of 6 points.
Training with print Braille letters is important.
Next step can be to create letters on a slate.
When learning to read Braille, it´s good to have an experienced teacher.
Perkins Braille-machine is an important tool to master.
It´s nice to have a peer to tell what is written on the blackboard.
